name: Highway Car Traffic Driver
description:
We are with the best traffic racing game of the year 2017. Carry out any challenging tasks in the car you want in traffic. Race against time, if you want free drive car in the mode.

Choose nice and fast cars from each other, modify your cars. If you like it in the garage, paint the color you like.

Go close to the traffic in the traffic, you will feel like you are really driving with realistic traffic system.

2 Drive with different camera angles, see the steering wheel, and enjoy your driving experience with the external camera if you do not want to.

Realistic seasonal options, snowy roads, cloudy weather, tunnels, bridges.

4 different driving modes, traffic racer mode, traffic driving mode, close transition mode, timed mode, such as many different driving experience awaits you.

You will find yourself in the middle of a car race.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
